manufacturer_part_number.description: Manufacturer part number of the product

quantity_on_hand.description: Current quantity on hand for the product

is_non_taxable.description: Flag indicating if the product is non-taxable

e_product_allow_multiple_deliveries.description: Flag indicating if multiple deliveries are allowed for electronic products

call_for_shipping.description: Flag indicating if shipping details need to be requested

quickbooks_item_id.description: QuickBooks item ID for accounting purposes

rate_adjustment_type.description: Type of rate adjustment for the product

use_tabs.description: Flag indicating if tabs are used to display product information

override_theme_use_tabs.description: Flag indicating if theme tab override is enabled

long_description_1.description: First long description of the product

is_non_shipping_item.description: Flag indicating if the product does not require shipping

e_product_delivery_action.description: Action to be taken upon electronic product delivery

use_variant_inventory.description: Flag indicating if variant inventory is used

is_featured_item.description: Flag indicating if the product is featured

long_description_external_url_1.description: External URL for the first long description

long_description_external_url_3.description: External URL for the third long description

long_description_external_url_5.description: External URL for the fifth long description

bullets_external_url.description: External URL for detailed information related to bullet points

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the product was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the product was last updated

is_kit.description: Flag indicating if the product is a kit

is_child_product.description: Flag indicating if the product is a child product

is_non_inventory.description: Flag indicating if the product is a non-inventory item

is_discontinued.description: Flag indicating if the product is discontinued

eta_date.description: Estimated Time of Arrival date for the product

quantity_on_order.description: Quantity of the product on order

available_region_id.description: Region ID where the product is available for purchase

call_for_shipping_on_whole_order.description: Flag indicating if shipping needs to be requested for the entire order

break_out_shipping.description: Flag indicating if shipping is separately charged for the product

shipping_classification_code.description: Code for shipping classification of the product

exclude_parent_from_display.description: Flag indicating if parent product should be excluded from display

drop_ship.description: Flag indicating if the product is drop-shipped

no_price_mask.description: Flag indicating if price masking is disabled

tax_code.description: Tax code associated with the product

use_map_pricing.description: Flag indicating if map pricing is used for the product

last_item_number.description: Last item number assigned to the product

has_visible_variants.description: Flag indicating if the product has visible variants

product_rating_dimension_group_override_.description: ID for overriding product rating dimension group

average_review_rating.description: Average rating of reviews for the product

review_count.description: Number of reviews received for the product

exclude_children_from_display.description: Flag indicating if child products should be excluded from display

use_pricing_from_parent.description: Flag indicating if pricing should be derived from the parent product

low_stock_warning_threshold.description: Threshold limit for low stock warning

enable_low_stock_warning.description: Flag indicating if low stock warning is enabled for the product

do_not_discount.description: Flag indicating if the product is not eligible for discounts

head_tags.description: HTML head tags for SEO purposes

handling_fee.description: Fee charged for handling the product

e_product_serial_number_file_path.description: File path for storing electronic product serial numbers

hide_variant_surcharges.description: Flag indicating if variant surcharges should be hidden

quantity_increment.description: Quantity increment for ordering the product

gtin.description: Global Trade Item Number for the product

add_to_cart_message.description: Message displayed when adding the product to the cart

subscription_frequency.description: Frequency of subscription for the product

e_product_generic_username.description: Generic username for accessing electronic products

insurance_cost.description: Cost of insurance for the product

exclude_from_commissions.description: Flag indicating if the product is excluded from commissions

days_until_reorder_allowed.description: Number of days until reorder is allowed for the product

force_separate_order.description: Flag indicating if a separate order is required for the product

approval_required.description: Flag indicating if approval is required for purchasing the product

additional_points_earned.description: Additional points earned when purchasing the product

allowed_variable_subscription_types.description: List of variable subscription types allowed for the product

profile_id.description: Profile ID associated with the product

is_linked_product.description: Flag indicating if the product is linked to another product

master_product_id.description: ID of the master product for variants

do_not_send_review_request.description: Flag indicating if review requests should not be sent
